quagga.input.subject: Re: Confirm Desk Group
quagga.input.xcc: Tana Jones, Samantha Boyd, Stephanie Panus
quagga.input.body:
Susan,
I don't know who Laura Dewett is, but the other three are on "my" Confirm 
desk.  We have a couple of new people starting next week, so I'll send you an 
updated list as soon as they're set up for e-mail access.

Thanks,
Joe






Susan Bailey
03/12/2001 02:01 PM
To: Larry Joe Hunter/HOU/ECT@ECT
cc: Tana Jones/HOU/ECT@ECT, Samantha Boyd/NA/Enron@Enron, Stephanie 
Panus/NA/Enron@Enron 
Subject: Confirm Desk Group

Joe,

As mentioned in my voice mail -- please advise as to whether the following 
individuals should to be included in the Group known as "Confirm Desk":

   Andrea Guillen
   Gordon Heaney
   Scott Tackett
   Laura Dewett

Thanks.

Cordially,
Susan S. Bailey
Enron North America Corp.
1400 Smith Street, Suite 3806A
Houston, Texas 77002
Phone: (713) 853-4737
Fax: (713) 646-3490
E:mail:  Susan.Bailey@enron.com
